title: Allow an Window to minimize programatically
body: This is only relevant for desktop UWP apps.

comments.body: What exactly is the reason Microsoft removed the API to minimize the window for UWP desktop apps?  This is very useful in many use cases and can be done simply by a single line of code, formName.WindowState = FormWindowState.Minimized, in C# Windows Forms .NET framework. Very basic functionality that used to exist at the core for long. Besides, this issue was logged on Feb. 2017, and after 9 months is still not even scheduled/prioritized by Microsoft. Frustrating.
